title: The Kidnapped Smile
description: Mona Lisa kidnapped? Her father, Leonardo, in tears? What will the Deliverers do?It has been a year since Alex and Bartholomew first ventured into the mystical Artania. Once again they are called upon to keep this art-created world safe.But peril waits at every turn.Traitorous Pirates. Fearful gods and goddesses. Monsters of the deep. A worldâ€™s safety lies in the hands three twelve-year-olds. Alex and Bartholomew, with their spunky sidekick Gwen, return to Artania to wrench the kidnapped Mona Lisa from the hands of ruthless pirates.
author: Laurie Woodward
